WorkItem.Description:
Getting a strange behavior.
 
If I change a buff from off and then on, all the item dps values and items move around. This also happens when I change a filter value, eg. Disable/Enable BOP Alchemy (Crafted).
 
Surely, when I select/deselect an option, the item dps values and order should return to where they were, eg :
Buff on Item 1(200) Item 2(180) Item 3(160) Item 4(140)   Buff off Item 1(180) Item 2(160) Item 3(140) Item 4(120)
Buff on Item 1(200) Item 2(180) Item 3(160) Item 4(140)   Buff off Item 1(180) Item 2(160) Item 3(140) Item 4(120)
 
But I get something like :
Buff on Item 1(200) Item 2(180) Item 3(160) Item 4(140)  Buff off Item 1(180) Item 2(160) Item 3(140) Item 4(120)
Buff on Item 1(205) Item 3(186) Item 4(162) Item 2(135)  Buff off Item 1(188) Item 2(164) Item 4(135) Item 3(111)
 
Hope I've made myself clear.
TIA.
WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Item values keep changing and moving about

Comments.Message: Forgot to mention that I was using my Mage during this.
Is this still an issue in the latest version?

Sorry for the late response.
Yes, seems to working as expected in 4.0.16.0b.
Many thanks.
Is it possible if you can post your character file so that we can see what is going on?

Sorry, you seem to have miss-read my post.
It is working properly now :-)
Thanks.
